data.text: @dpdzaragoza Hi Diane! Yoga mat is allowed for both check-in and hand carry. But be reminded that for hand carry, since passengers are allowed to bring 1 hand carry bag only (no extra bag or item is allowed) your yoga mat should be inside a bag together with your other stuff. Thank you!

data.text: @xanne_a Hi xanne_a. Please do the following troubleshooting and then try again. -Clear your browser's cache and cookies -Use another device (e.g. laptop, desktop computer, etc.) -Try to use Google Chrome browser if possible. For mobile app, ensure that the version is updated.

@_hermanocru Hi this herman! You may bring a cake for hand carry. But please be advised that each passenger is only allowed to bring one (1) piece hand carry (backpack or wheeled bag) which should not exceed the dimension of 56cmx36cmx23cm and must not weigh over 7kgs.
@yileerendave I'm sorry to hear this KD. Can I have your case number or chat session number so we could check and follow up your concern?

@Roniverse1 Hi there, Roniverse! Barangay ID can be accepted at check-in as long as it's valid with photo, date of birth and signature. Remember, all documents/ IDs presented are subject to airports discretion and profiling.

data.text: @TotoroxFriends I'm sorry to hear about this experience ロナちゃん. We will help you look into it. For assistance and the security of your personal information, you may send the details of your concern thru: https://t.co/GI0vBw3mMi and ask Charlie to connect you to a live chat agent. Stay safe.
@crystalmaeden All perfume containers (or that of other liquids, aerosols, or gels) must also be placed in a transparent, resealable plastic bag, approximately 20cm x 20cm. Hope this helps.

@crystalmaeden -Each passenger may only bring up to 1L of perfume (or other liquids, aerosols, or gels). 
The basis of the restriction will be container, which should not exceed 100ml.

@crystalmaeden Hi crystalmaeden! Liquids, aerosols and gels such as sunblock, may be allowed in your hand carry provided that the following rules are followed:
-Each bottle of cleanser (or other liquids, aerosols, or gels) must not exceed 100ml.

data.text: @douraG21 As checked, our website is up and running. Please try to clear your browser's cache and cookies -Use another device (e.g. laptop, desktop computer, etc.) -Try to use Google Chrome browser if possible. For mobile app, ensure that the version is updated. Stay safe!
@ainalogous Guests checking in baggage that exceeds the 39" limit on any one side will be classified as an oversized bag, and will be charged PHP 800 for Domestic flight. Hope this helps!

@ainalogous Hi AINA. We accept paintings for check-in as long as properly packed. Any checked baggage with any other side longer than 39 inches including wheels, handles and packages will be considered as oversized baggage.

@KevinWr18694056 HI Kevin. We understand your concern but please be advised that all Ceb flights are not allowed to cancel unless CebFLEXI is added in your booking. Also, you have agreed to the policies and Terms & conditions of the ticket upon purchase. Thank you.
@ktdascano Got this, ktdascano! I'll reach out to a case owner and will respond to you soon. For the meantime, please monitor your email. Thank you for your patience.
@douraG21 We are sorry to hear this, AG. May we verify the issue encountered when you tried to open the manage booking page? Thanks.

data.text: We want everyJuan to fly easy, and that goes for our brothers and sisters on the spectrum, too. As we celebrated World Children’s Day, we teamed up with ASP (the Autism Society Philippines) for “Autism Angels Take Flight”! data.text: @fualium We will help you look into it. For assistance and the security of your personal information, you may send the details of your concern thru: https://t.co/GI0vBw3mMi and ask Charlie to connect you to a live chat agent. Stay safe.
@NicaSU97 Hi Nica! This is Bern. Please visit this link to know how to Add and Upgrade CEB Prepaid Baggage To Booking https://t.co/lXA1ChoAfE. See you soon!

@_rlfrd Hi Rio! Tel here. I will be glad to look into it. Can I have your case number so I could reach out to the case owner? Please monitor the email used in filing this case. Thanks for your patience!

@AweSAMpyo Flight times shown in the Itinerary Receipt are not guaranteed and may change between the date of reservation and the date of travel as circumstances may warrant, Sam. Again, we are sorry for the inconvenience. Thank you!

@AweSAMpyo We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. We want all our guests to have a smooth worry free travel but there are reasons that are beyond our control which forced us to cancel or defer schedules of some flights.

@AweSAMpyo Except for connections within its network, the Airline is strictly a point-to-point carrier and is not responsible for any connecting flight of the Passenger or for any misconnection arising from any reason whatsoever. We are sorry but we cannot refund your bus ticket. Thank you!
@AweSAMpyo Hi Sam! Tel here. May we clarify what do you mean by lost ticket? Thank you!

@AweSAMpyo Please do not hesitate to send us a message via Charlie the chatbot on the Cebu Pacific website, start chatting anytime and ask Charlie to connect you to a live chat agent and we will be glad to assist you on your concern. Thanks!
@AweSAMpyo Hi Sam! Tel here. Regret if you feel that way. Rest assured that we continue to listen and improve our services so we can deliver the best experience for everyJuan.
@ShutangLifeTo Hi Rose. You may also send us a private message through this link: https://t.co/gNaqWVnrV6 and we will respond to you through the email you provided. Thank you!

urls.description: SIGN UP FOR A MYCEBUPACIFIC ACCOUNT AND WIN! Prize: Two (2) Roundtrip all-inclusive tickets to any CEB Philippine destination STEP 1 Sign up and create a MyCebuPacific Account at cebupacificair.com/sign-up and verify your email on or before November 19, 2022. Existing members may be eligible if email is subscribed to Cebu Pacific email database and is fully verified by abovementioned date. STEP 2 All eligible membe rs will receive an email on November 21, 2022 with a survey link. Fill out all the required

data.text:
@Bonemakrr Hi Bonebreakrr. Email you have received is legit. All eligible members (new/existing) will receive an email on November 21, 2022 w/ survey link. Members must fill out survey form completely on or before December 9, 2022 to qualify.
For more info, visit https://t.co/LFbdlYCsY8.

data.text: @AnnGenayas Hi Julie! Tel here. We will help you look into it. For assistance and the security of your personal information, you may send the details of your concern thru: https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and ask Charlie to connect you to a live chat agent. Stay safe.

@Christi95277221 Hi Christine. Birth certificate are accepted for child or infant only. If adult, valid ID includes Company or School ID, passport, or government-issued ID. SSS, GSIS, Driver’s License, Unified Multi-Purpose ID, PRC ID, PWD ID or OSCA.
@biiimb Sorry for the confusion. Thank you for providing your case number 7258915. As checked, this is already being handled via live chat. Thank  you!
@Christi95277221 Hi Christine. Brgy clearance will not be accepted as valid ID. Please present any Government ID, school ID or Company ID. Thanks!
@biiimb I will be glad to look into it. Can I have your case number so I could reach out to the case owner? Please monitor the email used in filing this case. Thanks for your patience!

data.text: @fualium I'm sorry to hear this æ-v. Please do the following troubleshooting & try again. -Clear your browser's cache and cookies -Use another device (e.g. laptop, desktop computer, etc.) -Try to use Google Chrome browser if possible. For mobile app, ensure that the version is updated.

@acetierwense Below are the conditions in carrying a power bank:
A. 20000mAh and below - can be hand-carried with no particular or specific number of pieces
B. more than 20000mAh to 32000mAh - maximum of 2 pieces is allowed in hand carry
C. more than 32000mAh - Not allowed
Thank you!

@acetierwense Hi ㄹ. Spare/loose batteries like Power banks, must be carried in hand-carry baggage only & must NOT exceed 100Wh (equivalent to about 20,000mAh to 27,000mAh depending on the output voltage). And must be individually protected to avoid short-circuit.

data.text: @seanko00671654 Hi seanko00671654! Please be advised that ancillary such as baggage, meal, seat, etc. cannot be removed/cancelled anymore once added to a booking whether this is paid or not. You may still settle the amount due up to 2 hours before your flight. Stay safe!

@httptwt_kent Hi there! Box is accepted as check-in baggage. Note that checked baggage must also not exceed 39 inches on any side. Any checked baggage that exceeds 39 inches will be charged an oversized baggage fee. For more info, visit https://t.co/ovQWzepd1T. Hope this helps!

For assistance and security of your personal information you may send the details of your concern through: https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and ask Charlie to connect you with the live agent. Our team will be glad to assist you.

@jellyshushuu Hi there, Jelly!! For a better CEB customer experience, we're moving all of our chat engagements here: https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK. Click on the link and start chatting with Charlie the Chatbot and our live agents! We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

@juan_ph14 Hi juan_ph14. We're moving all of our chat engagements here: https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK. Click on the link and start chatting with Charlie the Chatbot and our live agents! Our team will be glad to assist you.

@jhrldnnn Hello jhrldnnn! Joe an here. Yes, you can bring a hair iron in your hand carry, as long as it fits in the dimensions for hand carry. For more info, visit https://t.co/rfiF2XaINK. Hope this helps!

@josh9rivera Flights on which you may use your CEB Super Pass is subject to availability during redemption. On the Search Flight page, search and select a flight marked with “CEB Super Pass” from the list of flights available.

urls.title: Cebu Pacific - CEB Super Pass
urls.description: We heard you, everyJuan! The CEB Super Pass is back, until October 13, 2022 only! Buy as many one-way vouchers as you can and fly to any Philippines destination, anytime! Terms and conditions apply. We've reached the maximum number of passes sold. This was a great run! Super thank you! CEB Super Pass selling period has ended. Check out our Seat Sale page for more offers! Redeem your voucher and book a flight to any Philippine destination! Redemption Period: October 10, 2022 to November 23, 2023 Travel

data.text: @josh9rivera Hi Joshua. The CEB Super Pass may be used to redeem flights as early as thirty (30) days before the intended flight departure. The latest that the CEB Super Pass can be redeemed is seven (7) days before the intended flight departure thru  https://t.co/C67eV6f1rH.
@dmist24 Got this dExtEr. I'll let your case handler know that you reached out so that we can send you an update. Please expect an email from us soon.
@MariaElaiza05 Hi,  Maria Elaiza 松本!  Bern here. You may check on our existing promotional fares in our website https://t.co/wngAzjsY1k. See you on-board!
@TornadoKween Congratulations Kweeen!
@ANNsuperholic You're most welcome Kath 🤍💙!
